tool_description: Highly available easy-to-use **TikTok** intelligent **proxy** with the best performance. Get any data from Instagram with **99.99% uptime**.  Bigger API plans and **additional functionality** are available on request. Looking forward to hearing you on Telegram: **https://t.me/chilledlobster**. #tiktok #tik #tok #tik-tok #video #music #user #feed #hashtag #challenge #trending #trend #comments #comment #image #photo #media #search #scrapper #grabber
title: TikTok best experience

api_list.name: Followings by User ID
api_list.description: You can GET user's followings by User ID (uid/id).

optional_parameters.name: min_time
optional_parameters.description: used for pagination, can be found in response to previous request

optional_parameters.name: max_time
optional_parameters.description: used for pagination, can be found in response to previous request

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktok-best-experience.p.rapidapi.com/user/id/{user_id}/followings"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktok-best-experience.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Trending Videos for Region
api_list.description:
You can GET Trending Videos for a **specific Region**. For now, supported regions are: **RU**, **US**, **GB**, **DE**, **FR**, **ES**, **AU**, **BR**, **CA**, **GR**, **IL**, **IT**, **MX**, **NL**, **PE**, **PL**, **SE**, **UA**, **VE**, **ID**, **SV**, **CR**, **TR**, **PT**, **TH**.
If you need any other region please contact us via telegram.

required_parameters.name: region
required_parameters.description:
You should specify a region for Trending Videos.
For now, supported regions are: **RU**, **US**, **GB**, **DE**, **FR**, **ES**, **AU**, **BR**, **CA**, **GR**, **IL**, **IT**, **MX**, **NL**, **PE**, **PL**, **SE**, **UA**, **VE**, **ID**, **SV**, **CR**, **TR**, **PT**, **TH**.
If you need any other region please contact us via telegram.

optional_parameters.name: custom_cursor
optional_parameters.description: In a response you have a **custom_cursor** parameter's value  for a next set
